PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-20591998-11-190,  ,  ,  IA&ND, 
PrecisAppointment of MILES RICHARDSON, of Haida Gwaii, as Chief Commissioner of the British Columbia Treaty Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective November 20, 1998 and ending on the earlier of November 19, 2001 or on the date on which the appointment is terminated.
Attachments
